body: Finally I hope more of his works get translated now
Seen one of this artist translate on this site and I can't wait for more if it's this good. Don't really mind the reverse ntr but it's just getting better.

Have seen this author many times in pixiv. Few in here while this is the first time get translated. The very first from all of author work get translated. Wow. Author really love reverse-ntr.                In case of this... Someone Get angry for reverse-ntr I dislike NTR and I don't want to see any 'male steal female from another male' NTR. but if it 'female steal male from another female' (or female steal another female from the male) that's an exception. It confused with NTR part and the most thing that happen is NTR is 'Netori male netorare female'. pls, get that thing away from me! in netorare, universal, mostly it's the female who gets netorare. so reverse netorare to indicate male who gets netorare. apply same to netori, mostly it's the male who netori her. 264460 is one of the rare, the female wants the female who is dating with the male. but as I say, mostly in NTR it's '(netori) male steal (netorare) female' Gyaku netorare = reverse netorare
Wow, I love netorare but this is a hot, steamy pile of garbage
yeah all the work of this artist are reverse ntr and most of them are sad but still its rare. i need every work to be translated.
